SGX 101

SSLab

We have been actively working on SGX related research. These research projects can be broadly classified into three different categories: System Design, Defense, and Attack.

  • Please take a look at our achievements on Attacks and Defenses for Intel SGX (PDF). Demo videos can also be viewed under SGX Bootstrap/CCS17 Tutorial.

  • Please find the selective projects here.
